name: Graveyard Path
description:
Graveyard Path

This is a small 2D Platformer against your biological clock. Try to reach the end of the game, while collecting as many roses as possible. Use your age as an advantage!

Controls: MoveW A S DAgeQ
Jump / HitSpaceResetRHelpH Info:

Every life stage has different abilities, it's your task to figure them out.

This Game was made for Ludum Dare 50.
